q: In his keynote speech Monday at the trade show, Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer rebutted that suggestion. "Nokia's support will help Windows Phone overall to build strength versus other mobile platforms," Steve Ballmer said. That's not just good for Nokia, that's good for all our handset partners. Steve Ballmer also demonstrated some of the improvements that are coming to Windows Phone 7 this year. They include a faster Web browser and quicker switching between applications. Bloomberg)-- Andy Coulson resigned as director of communications for U.K. Prime Minister David Cameron , citing "continuing pressures" over allegations of illegal phone tapping while he was editor of the News of the World newspaper. Unfortunately continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110 percent needed in this role, Andy Coulson said in an e-mailed statement today. "Nothing is more important than the government's task of getting this country back on its feet." Andy Coulson resigned from the newspaper, owned by Rupert Murdoch 's

Eric Schmidt dodges talk of becoming future Apple CEO Google chairman Eric Schmidt is sidestepping discussion of whether he might become the next Apple CEO. In the first place, it's not appropriate. Steve[ Jobs] is still the CEO and I hope he continues forever, Eric Schmidt told CNBC in a Monday interview. Following are analysts' comments on his decision and its implications for Prime Minister David Cameron : OPPOSITION Labor PARTY LEADER ED MILIBAND Labour has been saying for some months that there are real questions about Andy Coulson 's ability to do his job given the cloud of allegations hanging over him. We think he should have gone earlier. He has now done the right thing. I think there are questions about David Cameron 's judgment, about hanging on to him as long as he did. TIM BALE, PROFESSOR OF POLITICS, UNIVERSITY OF SUSSEX "It's obviously damaging because Andy Coulson was a very effective media operator so he is losing someone who was incredibly useful to the David Cameron operation
